name: completionist
author: Michelle Blanchette
description: Asana task management integration for WordPress.

scripts.build: wp-scripts build src/index_DashboardWidget.jsx src/index_Automations.jsx src/index_BlockEditor.jsx --output-path=build && npm run styles
scripts.start: wp-scripts start src/index_DashboardWidget.jsx src/index_Automations.jsx src/index_BlockEditor.jsx --output-path=build && npm run watch:styles
